file_content.text:
Work Order: GSI EXPLORATORY SERVICES
Through fissures in Ziost's crust, geomagnetic activity has been detected that may be indicative of EM pulses of incredible speed. It is unclear whether the planet's catastrophic event is responsible for the anomaly, or whether the anomaly can be replicated for technological purposes. An onsite study following an active pulse via Rapid Geoanalysis Scout could provide the data required to better understand the phenomenon.
WARNING: You may prefer to send a droid in your stead. Atmospheric conditions may appear to be within acceptable parameters, but that does not mean lifeforms are safe.
